verses.verse: Now <S%G1161><s%> <S%G4012>concerning<s%> <S%G4152>spiritual<s%> gifts, <S%G80>brethren,<s%> I <S%G2309>would<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> have <S%G5209>you<s%> <S%G50>ignorant.<s%>

Ye <S%G1492>know<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> ye <S%G2258>were<s%> <S%G1484>Gentiles,<s%> carried <S%G520>away<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> these <S%G880>dumb<s%> <S%G1497>idols,<s%> even <S%G5613>as<s%> ye were <S%G71>led.<s%> <S%G302><s%>

Wherefore <S%G1352><s%> I give you to <S%G1107>understand,<s%> <S%G5213><s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> no <S%G3762>man<s%> <S%G2980>speaking<s%> <S%G1722>by<s%> the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G3004>calleth<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G331>accursed:<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> that no <S%G3762>man<s%> <S%G1410>can<s%> <S%G2036>say<s%> that <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> is the <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> <S%G1508>but<s%> <S%G1722>by<s%> the <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Ghost.<s%>
Now <S%G1161><s%> there <S%G1526>are<s%> <S%G1243>diversities<s%> of <S%G5486>gifts,<s%> <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G846>same<s%> <S%G4151>Spirit.<s%>
And <S%G2532><s%> there <S%G1526>are<s%> <S%G1243>differences<s%> of <S%G1248>administrations,<s%> <S%G2532>but<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G846>same<s%> <S%G2962>Lord.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> there <S%G1526>are<s%> <S%G1243>diversities<s%> of <S%G1755>operations,<s%> <S%G1161>but<s%> it <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G846>same<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> which <S%G1754>worketh<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3956>all.<s%>
But <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G5321>manifestation<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> is <S%G1325>given<s%> to every <S%G1538>man<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G4851>profit<s%> withal.

For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G1722>by<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> are <S%G2249>we<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G907>baptized<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G4983>body,<s%> <S%G1535>whether<s%> we be <S%G2453>Jews<s%> <S%G1535>or<s%> <S%G1672>Gentiles,<s%> <S%G1535>whether<s%> we be <S%G1401>bond<s%> <S%G1535>or<s%> <S%G1658>free;<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> have been <S%G3956>all<s%> made to <S%G4222>drink<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G4151>Spirit.<s%>

If <S%G1487><s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3650>whole<s%> <S%G4983>body<s%> were an <S%G3788>eye,<s%> <S%G4226>where<s%> were <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G189>hearing?<s%> <S%G1487>If<s%> the <S%G3650>whole<s%> were <S%G189>hearing,<s%> <S%G4226>where<s%> were <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3750>smelling?<s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> they <S%G2258>were<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G3196>member,<s%> <S%G4226>where<s%> were <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4983>body?<s%>
But <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3568>now<s%> are they <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G3196>members,<s%> <S%G1161>yet<s%> but <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G4983>body.<s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> the <S%G3788>eye<s%> <S%G1410>cannot<s%> <S%G3756><s%> <S%G2036>say<s%> unto <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G5495>hand,<s%> I <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G5532>need<s%> of <S%G4675>thee:<s%> <S%G2228>nor<s%> <S%G3825>again<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2776>head<s%> to <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4228>feet,<s%> I <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G5532>need<s%> of <S%G5216>you.<s%>

Nay, <S%G235><s%> <S%G4183>much<s%> <S%G3123>more<s%> those <S%G3196>members<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4983>body,<s%> which <S%G1380>seem<s%> to <S%G5225>be<s%> more <S%G772>feeble,<s%> <S%G2076>are<s%> necessary: <S%G316><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> hath <S%G5087>set<s%> <S%G3739>some<s%> <S%G3303><s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1577>church,<s%> <S%G4412>first<s%> <S%G652>apostles,<s%> <S%G1208>secondarily<s%> <S%G4396>prophets,<s%> <S%G5154>thirdly<s%> <S%G1320>teachers,<s%> after <S%G1899>that<s%> <S%G1411>miracles,<s%> <S%G1534>then<s%> <S%G5486>gifts<s%> of <S%G2386>healings,<s%> <S%G484>helps,<s%> <S%G2941>governments,<s%> <S%G1085>diversities<s%> of <S%G1100>tongues.<s%>

<S%G3361><s%> <S%G2192>Have<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G5486>gifts<s%> of <S%G2386>healing?<s%> <S%G3361>do<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G2980>speak<s%> with <S%G1100>tongues?<s%> <S%G3361>do<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G1329>interpret?<s%>
